text: ood pressure Short stature An unusually large head (macrocephaly) Skeletal abnormalities such as scoliosis GeneReview's Web site offers more specific information about the features of NF1. Please click on the link to access this resource. The Human Phenotype Ontology provides the following list of signs and symptoms for Neurofibromatosis type 1. If the information is available, the table below includes how often the symptom is seen in people with this condition. You can use the MedlinePlus Medic
